page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE - EMPLOYED 2
page.content: My wife is quite happy here. She has many friends in the village and is always popping off to see them. She is also involved in many of the local groups such as the Womens Institute and the Friends of the School. They always seem tobe organising jumble sales and the like so this keeps her quite occupied. She can drive the car so she finds it easy to get over to the shops in Taffs Well and once a week we make a shopping trip to Asda for the main buying. After a day at work, I tend to want to just get home and relax. I did play football until a couple of years ago but now I am happier just going off to the pub for a quiet drink. Because this is such a friendly place, it is not too hard to get baby sitters so my wife and I manage to get out together quite regularly.
